name: RS Survey
author: RichestSoft

sections.description:
Create Surveys and see results submitted by users very easy very useful.
Easy to use and userfriendly.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Download Survey.zip extract to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to yoursiteurl/survey and Enjoy
